name: Rajesh Kumar
bio: Passionate software engineer with over 15 years of experience in full-stack development. Specializes in cloud architecture and microservices. Love mentoring junior developers and contributing to open-source projects. In free time, enjoy playing cricket and exploring new technologies.

name: Emily Chen
bio: Product leader with a passion for building user-centric experiences. 12+ years driving product strategy for consumer-facing applications. Strong believer in data-driven decision making and agile methodologies. Outside work, I'm an avid hiker and photography enthusiast who loves capturing Bay Area sunsets.

name: David Thompson
bio: Award-winning designer focused on creating accessible and inclusive digital experiences. 16 years of experience in design thinking and user research. Advocate for design systems and component-driven development. When not designing, you'll find me at local art galleries or practicing calligraphy.

name: Priya Sharma
bio: DevOps specialist passionate about automation and infrastructure as code. Expert in Kubernetes, Docker, and CI/CD pipelines. 14 years building scalable cloud solutions. Strong advocate for DevSecOps practices. In my spare time, I volunteer teaching coding to underrepresented communities and practice yoga.

name: Michael O'Brien
bio: Strategic technology consultant with 17+ years advising Fortune 500 companies on digital transformation. Specialize in enterprise architecture and change management. Led multiple successful cloud migration projects. Outside consulting, I'm passionate about sustainable technology and enjoy sailing Sydney Harbour on weekends.
